name: Oth

trait.name: Amorphous
text: The oth, including its equipment, can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Multiple Roles
text: Choose either the Dripping Arcanist (Innate Spellcasting) or Paladin of Shoth trait.

trait.name: Paladin Of Shoth
text: The oth derives its power from Shoth itself, its zom shining with sacred light. Its Armor Class increases by 2. A non-shoth creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the oth must succeed on a DC 15 Charisma saving throw or be blinded by the light of Shoth until the end of its turn.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
text: The oth's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring only verbal components:
At will: fire bolt (2d10), light, thaumaturgy
3/day each: command, mage armor, magic missile

action.name: Multiattack
text: The oth makes two oozing slam attacks or one oozing slam and one greatsword attack.

action.name: Oozing Slam
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d10 + 3) bludgeoning damage and 2 (1d4) acid damage.

action.name: Greatsword (Paladin of Shoth Only)
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 17 (4d6 + 3) slashing damage.

action.name: Merge
text: A shoth who has less than half its maximum hp can merge with any other shoth creature within 10 feet, adding its remaining hp to that creature's. The hp gained this way can exceed the normal maximum of that creature. A shoth can accept one such merger every 24 hours.

action.name: Spray (Recharge 6)
text: The oth sprays acid in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (5d8) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spells: fire bolt, light, thaumaturgy, command, mage armor, magic missile, augury, detect thoughts, fireball
